desc.cn: Pycairo 是一个为 cairo 图形库提供绑定的 Python 模块
desc.en: Pycairo is a Python module providing bindings for the cairo graphics library

debian/apt.cmd: sudo apt install libcairo2-dev pkg-config python3-dev

ubuntu/apt.cmd: sudo apt install libcairo2-dev pkg-config python3-dev

fedora/dnf.cmd: sudo dnf install cairo-devel pkg-config python3-devel

opensue/zypper.cmd: sudo zypper install cairo-devel pkg-config python3-devel
